snippet: Pacific Gas & Electric Co. has agreed to pay $70 million in restitution for the 2010 pipeline explosion that killed eight people in the San Francisco suburb of San Bruno.
abstract: Pacific Gas & Electric Co agrees to pay $70 million in restitution for the 2010 pipeline explosion that killed eight people in the San Francisco suburb of San Bruno, California.
lead_paragraph: Pacific Gas & Electric Co. has agreed to pay $70 million in restitution for the 2010 pipeline explosion that killed eight people in the San Francisco suburb of San Bruno.

headline.seo: Pacific Gas Establishes Fund as Restitution for Blast
headline.main: California: Pacific Gas Establishes Fund as Restitution for Fatal Blast
headline.print_headline: California: Pacific Gas Establishes Fund as Restitution for Fatal Blast
